result.markdown:
---
title: "Welcome to my blog!"
format:
  html:
    html-math-method: mathjax
---

For my first entry, I will just plug my very simple bird-song classifier, which can be found [here](https://huggingface.co/spaces/erabinov/bird_song_classifier). It is hosted using the free platform Hugging Face Spaces, so I may have to periodically rebuild. If it doesn't work for you, raise an issue on the GitHub page, and I will rebuild.

This is a very simple classifier I built using fastai. It uses an 18-layer neural net (resnet18) to classify sounds as being the songs of one of three species of bird: American Robin, Northern Cardinal, or Blue Jay.
